referenceObject.reference: Ponomarev, A. V. & Dvadnenko, K. V. (2013). Notes on the fauna of spiders (Aranei) of the southeast of Russian plain and the Caucasus with the description of a new species of the genus Haplodrassus Chamberlin, 1922 (Gnaphosidae). Vestnik Yuzhnogo Nauchnogo Tsentra 9(2): 47-56.
